Improvements.Improvement: Extract duplicate code to separate method
Improvements.Description: The code to check the tags of the objects in the bucket is duplicated. This can be extracted to a separate method to avoid code duplication.

Improvements.Improvement: Use try-with-resources for automatic resource management
Improvements.Description: Instead of manually closing the resource in a finally block, you can use a try-with-resources statement, which ensures that each resource is closed at the end of the statement.
